docs.snippet: Hackers draining online exchanges. Ponzi schemes. Regulators unable to keep up with heightened interest in virtual currencies. A young industry’s problems have become clearer in recent weeks.

docs.snippet: Todos quieren ser populares en internet. Algunos incluso pagan por ello. Descubre el mercado negro de las redes sociales.
